name: Avg all employee productivity for threshold
DBQuery: MATCH (n:PRODUCTIVITY) where n.completionDateEpochTime > 1593561600 AND n.completionDateEpochTime < 1596239999 WITH n.completionDateEpochTime as completionDateEpochTime, avg(n.storyPoints*8) as StoryPoint, avg(n.authorTimeSpent) as authorTimeSpent  return   completionDateEpochTime, StoryPoint, authorTimeSpent, round((toFloat(StoryPoint)/authorTimeSpent)*100) as Productivity LIMIT 1

name: Avg all employee productivity for threshold
DBQuery: MATCH (n:PRODUCTIVITY) where n.completionDateEpochTime > 1593561600 AND n.completionDateEpochTime < 1596239999 WITH n.completionDateEpochTime as completionDateEpochTime, avg(n.storyPoints*8) as StoryPoint, avg(n.authorTimeSpent) as authorTimeSpent  return   completionDateEpochTime, StoryPoint, authorTimeSpent, round((toFloat(StoryPoint)/authorTimeSpent)*100) as Productivity LIMIT 1

name: Avg all employee productivity for threshold
DBQuery: MATCH (n:PRODUCTIVITY) where n.completionDateEpochTime > 1593561600 AND n.completionDateEpochTime < 1596239999 WITH n.completionDateEpochTime as completionDateEpochTime, avg(n.storyPoints*8) as StoryPoint, avg(n.authorTimeSpent) as authorTimeSpent  return   completionDateEpochTime, StoryPoint, authorTimeSpent, round((toFloat(StoryPoint)/authorTimeSpent)*100) as Productivity LIMIT 1

name: Average Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA)  WHERE n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKvector = 'BUILD' and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as avgOutput LIMIT 2

name: Average Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA)  WHERE n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKvector = 'BUILD' and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as avgOutput LIMIT 2

name: Average Complexity
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN  COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKcomplexity)),0) as AvgComplexityCoverage LIMIT 2

name: Average Duplicated Blocks
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN  COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKduplication)),0) as AvgDuplicateBlocksCoverage LIMIT 2

name: Average Duplicated Blocks
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN   COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKduplication)),0) as AvgDuplicateBlocksCoverage LIMIT 2

name: Number of Quality Passed Blocks
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKqualityGate='pass' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfQualityBlocks LIMIT 2

name: Number of Quality Passed Blocks
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKqualityGates='pass' RETURN  count(n) as NumberOfQualityBlocks LIMIT 2

name: Number of Quality Failed Blocks
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKqualityGate='fail' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfQualityBlocks LIMIT 2

name: Number of Quality Failed Blocks
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKqualityGate='fail' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfQualityBlocks LIMIT 2

name: Average Code Coverage
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN  n.SPKendTime as SPKendTime,COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKcoverage)),0) as AvgCodeCoverage LIMIT 2

name: Average Code Coverage
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN  COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKcoverage)),0) as AvgCodeCoverage LIMIT 2

name: Average Code Coverage
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN  n.SPKendTime as SPKendTime,COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKcoverage)),0) as AvgCodeCoverage LIMIT 2

name: Average Code Coverage
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKcoverage)),0) as AvgCodeCoverage LIMIT 2

name: Number of Successful Sonar Executions
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfSonarExecutions LIMIT 2

name: Number of Successful Sonar Executions
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfSonarExecutions LIMIT 2

name: Number of Failed Sonar Executions
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Failure' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfSonarExecutions LIMIT 2

name: Number of Failed Sonar Executions
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKstatus='Failure' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfSonarExecutions LIMIT 2

name: Average Code Issues in Deployment
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) WHERE  n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKvector = 'CODEQUALITY' with n where n.SPKstatus='Success'  RETURN  toInt(ROUND(Avg(n.SPKbugs))) as Bugs , toInt(ROUND(Avg(n.SPKcodeSmellsStr))) as CodeSmell, toInt(ROUND(Avg(n.SPKVulnerabilitiesStr))) as Vulnerablilities LIMIT 2

name: Total Hours Worked On Projects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA) where n.SPKprojectName in ['PaymentServices','MobileServices','ClaimFinder','AgentLocator'] and  n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 with n return distinct n.SPKprojectName as StoryTypes , sum(n.SPKduration)/3600 as Duration LIMIT 2

name: Maximum Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKvectors = 'BUILD' and n.SPKstatus='Success' RETURN COALESCE(Max(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as MaxBuildTime

name: Number of Closed Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKissueTypes='Bug' and n.SPKstatus='Closed'  RETURN n

name: Average Defect Duration
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKissueType='Bug' and n.SPKstatus='Closed'  RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInt(n.SPKduration)),0) as AvgDefectCompletionTime

name: Jenkins Build Failures V/S Success Trend
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE  n.SPKstartTime > 1593561600 and n.SPKstartTime < 1596239999 and n.SPKvector = 'BUILD' with n , case when n.SPKstatus='Failure'then count(n.SPKduration) end as Failure ,case when n.SPKstatus='Success'then count(n.SPKduration) end as Success RETURN  count(Failure) as Failure , count (Success) as Success

name: Defects Type Count
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA) WHERE  n.SPKstartTime > 1535760000 and n.SPKstartTime < 1538351999 RETURN DISTINCT n.SPKdefectDuring as Type, count(n) as Count

name: Total Hours Worked On Projects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA) where  n.SPKstartTime > 1535760000 and n.SPKstartTime < 1538351999 and n.SPKprojectName in ['PaymentServices','MobileServices','ClaimFinder','AgentLocator'] and  n.SPKstartTime > {startTime} and n.SPKstartTime < {endTime} with n return distinct n.SPKprojectName as StoryTypes , sum(n.SPKduration)/3600 as Duration

name: Avg all employee productivity for threshold
DBQuery: MATCH (n:PRODUCTIVITY) where n.completionDateEpochTime > 1535760000 AND n.completionDateEpochTime < 1538351999 WITH n.completionDateEpochTime as completionDateEpochTime, avg(n.storyPoints*8) as StoryPoint, avg(n.authorTimeSpent) as authorTimeSpent  return   completionDateEpochTime, StoryPoint, authorTimeSpent, round((toFloat(StoryPoint)/authorTimeSpent)*100) as Productivity

name: Total Code Issues in Deployment
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) WHERE  n.SPKstartTime > 1535760000 and n.SPKstartTime < 1538351999 and n.SPKvector = 'CODEQUALITY' with n where n.SPKstatus='Success'  RETURN  toInt(ROUND(SUM(n.SPKbugs))) as Bugs , toInt(ROUND(SUM(n.SPKcodeSmellsStr))) as CodeSmell, toInt(ROUND(SUM(n.SPKVulnerabilitiesStr))) as Vulnerablilities

name: Jenkins Build Failures V/S Success
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE  n.SPKstartTime > 1535760000  and n.SPKstartTime < 1538351999 and n.SPKvector = 'BUILD' with n , case when n.SPKstatus='Failure'then count(n.SPKduration) end as Failure ,case when n.SPKstatus='Success'then count(n.SPKduration) end as Success RETURN  count(Failure) as Failure , count (Success) as Success
